# md2cf

> CLI tool and Node.js library to sync Markdown files to Confluence Cloud pages. Converts Markdown to Atlassian Document Format (ADF) and publishes via the Confluence REST API v2.

md2cf is used from the terminal or by AI coding agents. Install globally with `npm install -g md2cf`, configure with `md2cf config`, then sync files with `md2cf <source> <url>`.

## Docs

- [Getting Started](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/getting-started): Installation and first sync
- [Syncing Pages](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/usage): Core CLI usage â€” update, create, options
- [Reading Pages](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/reading-pages): Read Confluence pages back as Markdown
- [Merge Strategies](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/merge-strategies): local-wins, auto-merge, remote-wins, append
- [Folder Sync](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/folder-sync): Recursive folder-to-Confluence hierarchy sync
- [Mermaid Diagrams](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/mermaid): Render mermaid code blocks as PNG attachments
- [Syntax Reference](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/markdown-syntax): Supported Markdown features and what to avoid
- [Common Recipes](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/examples): Copy-paste examples for common workflows
- [Using with AI Agents](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/agents): Skill installation and agent workflows
- [Library API](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/api/library): Use md2cf as a Node.js library
- [URL Formats](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/api/url-formats): Supported Confluence URL patterns
- [Full LLM reference](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/llms-full.txt): Complete self-contained reference for LLM agents

## Optional

- [CI / Automation](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/ci-automation): GitHub Actions and CI pipeline setup
- [Configuration](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/configuration): Config management commands
- [Sample Page](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/docs/sample): Example page with all supported features
- [Contributing](https://sujeet-pro.github.io/markdown-to-confluence-sync/contributing): Development setup and guidelines
